title: By the King and Queen, a declaration for the encouraging of French Protestants to transport themselves into this kingdom
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall this twenty fifth day of April, 1689, in the first year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
